body:
So, me and a couple friends recently made a survey aimed to resolve part of our concerns over a school proyect.
As instructed by our teacher, we were told 60 opinions were needed to accomplish a fraction of our proyect's final score so it'd be cool if you could dedicate 5 minutes of your spare time to answer this for us to gather your responses.

Note: I translated all of it so it's not a hassle for you to get.
Link: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1HoAcP940ummPtKG90TkCKdUUg4mB_3X-I1-7EdusvlI/viewform


Thanks in advance, :)
P.S: Don't even try to go for a troll response cause I could easily delete it.

title: [Survey] Honey Pops

replies.body:
Voy a reponder trollmente por que soy como novalikespvp

okno, on a serious note te amo juanoh sos el mejor referee de avicus, pa cuando el torneo 3? Preventas Reliquia para el sabado 16 por si queri!
